55 #ifdef _MSC_VER
56 inline void win_usleep(int delay_us)
57 {
58  stdext::threads::xtime _Tgt = _To_xtime(std::chrono::microseconds(delay_us));
59  _Thrd_sleep(&_Tgt);
60 }
61 #endif
62 
63 inline void MySleep(int delay)
64 {
65 #ifdef _MSC_VER
66  if (delay) Sleep(delay * 1000);
67 #else
68  ::sleep(delay);
69 #endif
70 }
71 
72 inline void MySleepMs(int delay_ms)
73 {
74 #ifdef _MSC_VER
75  if (delay_ms) Sleep((DWORD)delay_ms);
76 #else
77  struct timespec sleep_intrval;
78  double complete_seconds;
79  sleep_intrval.tv_nsec = static_cast<long>(1000000000.0 * (::modf(delay_ms / 1000.0, &complete_seconds)));
80  sleep_intrval.tv_sec = static_cast<time_t>(complete_seconds);
81  ::nanosleep(&sleep_intrval, NULL);
82 #endif
83 }
84 
85 inline void MySleepUs(int delay_us)
86 {
87 #ifdef _MSC_VER
88  if (delay_us) win_usleep(delay_us);
89 #else
90  ::usleep(delay_us);
91 
92 #endif
93 }

118 template <class IntType>
119 inline std::string unit_format(IntType n)
120 {
121  char buffer[1024];
122  if (n <= 9999ULL)
123  {
124  snprintf(buffer, 1024, "%4d ", int32(n));
125  return buffer;
126  }
127  if (n <= 9999999ULL)
128  {
129  snprintf(buffer, 1024, "%4d K", int32(n / 1000ULL));
130  return buffer;
131  }
132  if (n <= 9999999999ULL)
133  {
134  snprintf(buffer, 1024, "%4d M", int32(n / 1000000ULL));
135  return buffer;
136  }
137  if (n <= 9999999999999ULL)
138  {
139  snprintf(buffer, 1024, "%4d G", int32(n / 1000000000ULL));
140  return buffer;
141  }
142 
143  snprintf(buffer, 1024, "%4d T", int32(n / (1000000000ULL * 1000ULL)));
144  return buffer;
145 }

154  PCM_UNUSED(pcm_compile_assert_failed_);

157 class ThreadGroupTempAffinity
158 {
159  GROUP_AFFINITY PreviousGroupAffinity;
160 
161  ThreadGroupTempAffinity(); // forbidden
162  ThreadGroupTempAffinity(const ThreadGroupTempAffinity &); // forbidden
163  ThreadGroupTempAffinity & operator = (const ThreadGroupTempAffinity &); // forbidden
164

174 // see example usage in pcm-core.cpp

176 
177 class s_expect : public std::string
178 {
179 public:
180  explicit s_expect(const char * s) : std::string(s) {}
181  explicit s_expect(const std::string & s) : std::string(s) {}
182  friend std::istream & operator >> (std::istream & istr, s_expect && s);
183  friend std::istream & operator >> (std::istream && istr, s_expect && s);
184 private:
185 
186  void match(std::istream & istr) const
187  {
188  istr >> std::noskipws;
189  const auto len = length();
190  char * buffer = new char[len + 2];
191  buffer[0] = 0;
192  istr.get(buffer, len+1);
193  if (*this != std::string(buffer))
194  {
195  istr.setstate(std::ios_base::failbit);
196  }
197  delete [] buffer;
198  }
199 };
200 
201 inline std::istream & operator >> (std::istream & istr, s_expect && s)
202 {
203  s.match(istr);
204  return istr;
205 }
206 
207 inline std::istream & operator >> (std::istream && istr, s_expect && s)
208 {
209  s.match(istr);
210  return istr;
211 }
212 
213 inline tm pcm_localtime()
214 {
215  time_t now = time(NULL);
216  tm result;
217 #ifdef _MSC_VER
218  localtime_s(&result, &now);
219 #else
220  localtime_r(&now, &result);
221 #endif
222  return result;
223 }
